qas.question: What percentage of Imperial's staff was classified as world leading in 2008?
What percentage of Imperial's staff was deemed to be internationally excellent in 2008?
Which group assessed Imperial's staff members to determine their standing in relation to the rest of the world?
How many subjects were judged to be the best in terms of internationally recognised research quality?
what assesment showed 1225 staff to be world-leading?
What showed 26% of staff to be internationally excellent?

plausible_answers.text: Pure Mathematics, Epidemiology and Public Health, Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Mechanical, Aeronautical and Manufacturing Engineering

qas.question: What five subjects where shown to the top ranked in the world?

context: <b4_0><b5_0>The 2008 <a2_0>Research Assessment Exercise<b5_0/><b4_0/><a2_0/> returned <a0_0>26%<a0_0/> of the 1225 staff submitted as being world-leading (4*) and a further <a1_0>47%<a1_0/> as being internationally excellent (3*). The 2008 Research Assessment Exercise also showed <a3_0>five<a3_0/> subjects – <b6_0>Pure Mathematics, Epidemiology and Public Health, Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Mechanical, Aeronautical and Manufacturing Engineering<b6_0/> – were assessed to be the best[clarification needed] in terms of the proportion of internationally recognised research quality.
